ScrabbleTiles

public ScrabbleTiles()
A no arguements constructor that creates all the tiles to make a new game of scrabble

ScrabbleTiles

public ScrabbleTiles(ScrabbleTiles t,
                     int n)
A constructor to create a players set of tiles.

Parameters:
t - the set of game tiles that the player will choose from.
n - the number of tiles that the player starts out with.
Method Detail

drawTile

public Tile drawTile()
Randomly selects one tile from the tiles, removes it from the ArrayList and return the tile

Returns:
A randomly selected tile.

drawTiles

public void drawTiles(ScrabbleTiles t,
                      int n)
Draws n number of tiles from the game ScrabbleTiles and adds them to the players tiles

getScore

public int getScore(java.lang.String word)
Returns the total of all the letter values in a word or 0 if a letter is not a tile. gets each letter of the word. and call the letterInTiles method which finds where the letter is. With that tiles location, get the tile and get its value. Add up all the values.
